attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have been informed that a large care home in Southampton, Birch Lawn is closing down. The home offers vital care and support to long term residents and respite care. We urge the government to please reconsider the closing of this home because it offers a very valuable service for elderly people in this area. The news of this home closing has had a devastating effect on residents first and formost, staff who offer a great service and service users who use the home for respite care. Please please look into the descion to close Birch Lawn and please save it from closure

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
